lines.text:
[about a patient miss-treating her son]
She doesn't know how hard you struggle

[Simpering]
John is your best boy isn't he mother?

[as John consumes a concotion of liquids mixed with sliced bananas]
Yes John... you're my best boy and the best surgeon in town.

[Forcing him to consume a mass of pouched eggs]
Eat, Eat, EAT! You need energy... there's a nice boy.
Your head is filling with blood.
Years ago you were like a snail. Hiding... happy...

[toying fondly with a snail]
What are you looking at with those little eyes?

[to Patty]
Like the doctor said, it's all in your imagination. I really don't exist.
